digest:
- *APT-LLM* enhances LLM performance using novel data formats, achieving significant speedups on GPUs. Learn more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19087
- *pyFAST* offers a modular framework for efficient time series modeling, supporting sparse and multi-source data. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.18891
- *REMO* integrates memory-driven optimization with prompt tuning for LLMs, enhancing performance over time. Explore at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.18749
- *YuLan-OneSim* uses LLMs for large-scale social simulations, improving research efficiency. Discover more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.07581
- *VERIRL* boosts Verilog code generation using reinforcement learning, introducing new datasets and mechanisms. Read more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.18462
- *ClusterFusion* optimizes LLM inference by reducing latency through on-chip communication. Check it out at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.18850
- *Emotion Omni* proposes a model for empathetic speech response generation, enhancing human-machine interaction. See more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.18655
- *PRISM* enhances VLM safety with principled reasoning, achieving low attack rates. Code available at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.18649
